content: why choose between a hat and a bag when you can have both this crochet bucket hat pattern easily converts into a stylish crossbody purse or pouch making it the ultimate functional accessory modern practical and endlessly wearable this is a fun project with serious wow factor for this pattern you will need about 180 yards of cotton or cotton blend yarn and an h/ 5mm crochet hook ✨ pattern features convertible design bucket hat + crossbody purse or pouch stylish modern silhouette structured fabric that holds its shape practical size for everyday essentials fun unique project with real-world functionality
